EmailTemplate.name: Reminder of Signature
EmailTemplate.subject: ATTENTION NEEDED - Regarding your trademark application order
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your trademark application is ready for your signature. Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your trademark application is ready for your signature. You should have already received an email with instructions for electronically signing the application. Please review the email and application, and if everything is accurate and acceptable, sign the application. You have fourteen (14) days, from the day the instructions arrived, to sign the application. If you do not sign the application it may cause delays with your order.
If you have any questions about electronically signing your document, contact me as soon as possible using the contact information listed below.
If you have already signed your trademark application, thank you, and please disregard this email.
Best Regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | {!User.Phone} ext. {!User.Extension} Account Management Services M-F 9:00 am – 6 pm CT
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
